The Catholic Church has some problems. They are losing followers. This is because the Church is not very accepting of many things. They have strong views on things like marriage between two men or women, abortion, and birth control. These views are old-fashioned in some ways. If the Church changed its views, they might not lose followers.

Many people are against the Church because of its views. They do not agree with the Church on some subjects. The Church says abortion is wrong, and if you think abortion is right, you may not want to be a part of the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you may not want to be in a Church that says it is wrong.

The Church does not allow priests to be married or have women as priests. But this may not have stopped the Church's problems. It is hard to say what would have happened if priests could be married or if there were women priests.

The Church says priests are married to God and are devoted to their work. But other people have jobs and families too. They can balance work and family life. Why can't priests?

I am not opposed to marriage between people of the same sex. 

I think people are born gay. They do not make this choice. 

Others and I do not think it is right to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot. 

People are born gay. They do not have a choice. This is not a decision they made. 

I do not think the federal government should decide who can get married. This is a personal issue. 

I do not think gay people should be punished. They should be free to be who they are. 

I believe the federal government should not be involved in this issue. It is not a matter of national security or morality. It is a personal issue. 

People should be free to live as they are. They should not be punished for being gay.

I believe that gay marriage should be legal. Here is why.

There is no good reason not to. Many people think that gay couples are a threat to the heterosexual family. But this is not true. Gay couples are not the same as heterosexual couples. They have their own unique things.

It's like two different sides of the same coin. One side is heads, and the other side is tails. They are not the same.

Gay couples have the same civil rights as everyone else. They should be able to own property and get health care just like anyone else. If a gay person is sick, their partner should be able to visit them in the hospital. This is not just about being family, it's about love.

Many studies show that gay couples are happy and successful just like any other couple. They have the same reasons for a happy relationship as everyone else.

The issue is not about getting married in a church. It's about getting a marriage certificate from the government. This is a legal document, not a church thing.

Separate but equal is not fair. If the government gives gay couples a civil union, they should be allowed to marry.

Some people are worried about adoption and community issues. But this is not a reason to deny gay couples the right to marry. They are the same as any other couple.

The main problem is how children are treated by other people in society. Gay couples should be treated the same as any other couple. They should be able to go to school and play with their friends like everyone else.

Gay couples can be good parents just like anyone else. They can be involved in their community and be good neighbors.

I think the federal government should be involved in making gay marriage legal. The government should not make laws based on one person's moral views. This is not fair to everyone else.

President Bush has strong views on this issue. He thinks about this because of his religion. But the government should not make laws based on one person's religion. This is not fair to everyone else.

Many people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are not normal. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says this is not true. We should listen to scientists and experts, not just what our friends and neighbors think.

If we listen to the experts, we will see that gay people are just like everyone else. They are normal people who deserve to be treated with respect.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. A drug is not good or bad just because the law says so. I don't think we should make it available to the public. But we can use it to help people if a doctor says it is okay.

Many medicines are not legal, but we use them because they are helpful. We use oxycodone, vicodin, and perocet to help patients. These are not available to just anyone. We use them because they are good for people. If we do not allow people to use marijuana because it is not legal, then that is not fair. Everyone should be able to use marijuana if it helps them.

Marijuana and alcohol are not the same. If you take too much marijuana, it can be bad for you. But if you drink too much alcohol, it can also be bad for you. We should not ban marijuana like we do with alcohol. We should make it legal, but people must use it responsibly.

People have a bad idea of marijuana because it is not allowed. But marijuana is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way we think about marijuana, people will use it responsibly. We can use it to help people who are sick.

The church has changed over time. It is not as strict as it was before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore nice dresses and matching shoes. I also had a matching purse. This was what I wore every time I went to church. I went to a private school and saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church together. Now, things are different. The church now has a shorter service. It lasts only thirty minutes. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. Some wear beach clothes. Families often come in late. The church is more casual now, even on Sundays. People wear jeans and khakis. This is a big change.

There are other things I notice about the church. This is the church I know. I do not understand the church's politics. I do not know why they make some decisions.

Some people say the Catholic Church could have prevented problems with priests by allowing women to be priests or by allowing priests to get married. I do not think this would have helped. Some men are married and still have problems with children. Their choice to be a priest is not the reason for their problems. 

In some religions, priests are allowed to get married. Some people become priests and still want to be married. If they want to practice their faith and be married, they can choose a different faith.

I think the reasons for some priests' problems are based on their genes. I do not think people become this way because of how they are raised. It is their genes. We cannot change that with marriage. It may come out later. The church cannot prevent this from happening. If they knew about the problem and covered it up, that is wrong. But I do not think they knew in all cases.

I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea, but the September 11th attacks changed everything. Many people were in shock and the US went to war in Iraq for different reasons. The Bush administration connected the war to Osama Bin Laden and said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. But this was not true.

The Bush administration lied to the American people and still has not admitted it. Colin Powell said he was not sure about the evidence when he presented it at the UN. This is wrong and against the law. It is an impeachable offense to lie to the people.

The Bush administration does not respect the US Constitution and has tried to limit its power since 9/11. They wanted to go to war from the start. A former treasury secretary said the younger Bush wanted to go to war with Iraq because of his father's feud with Saddam Hussein. He also wanted to get more oil.

I think the war has gone on too long. If the US withdraws now, there will be civil war and more deaths. But a new plan to have other countries like Syria and Saudi Arabia help Iraq is not good. It will create more problems because Iraq's independence will be at risk.

The new Iraqi government is not working well. The parliament is not effective and the Prime Minister does not have control. A radical leader's party has a lot of power and there are still many groups fighting for control. This is causing problems in the political process.

I did not know what to say. Let me think about it. 

The war in Iraq is a complicated problem. I do not know a lot about it. However, I think it started because of the terrorist attacks on the United States on September 11. We went to war in Iraq because we thought they were involved. 

Now, I am not sure why we are staying there. I think it is because we want to build a democratic government in Iraq. We also want to get oil from them. But this is not a good reason to stay. It makes many people unhappy. 

If we stay, we have to build a democracy. This will take time. It is not easy to build a new government. If we leave, people in Iraq will be unhappy with us. They will have to start again. 

I am confused about the war in Iraq. I do not know what to say. I think we should not call it a war anymore. It was not officially declared by Congress. I do not think it is a good reason to stay in Iraq.

I do think it is good to help the people in Iraq. But it is also wasting our resources. I feel sorry for President Bush. The war is making him look bad. It is like the Vietnam War, which was also not declared. That war is now known as a meaningless war.

It is hard to say what I think about the war in Iraq. There are many families with sons and daughters in the war. I want to help them, but I also think we are hurting the people in Iraq. We are making their lives harder. They have different customs and ways of life. If we stay, we will try to change them. This will make things worse for them.

I think the war in Iraq will go on for a long time. It is a complicated problem. I do not know what to say.

I do not think it is right for a state or government to make laws about what churches can or cannot do. The United States Constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control the church. 

The Constitution clearly says this. If the government tries to make laws about the church, it would go against what is already written. 

Some people are trying to make it illegal because most Catholics and Christians do not support it. But that is not right. The government should not decide what churches can or cannot do. It is up to the churches to decide.

The separation of church and state is very important in the United States. It allows people to be free to believe what they want. The government did plan to make an amendment to the Constitution, but that would be wrong. It would go against what is already written.

The government should not be involved in this issue. The president is pushing for this amendment because of his own personal beliefs as a Catholic. He is showing that he prefers one religion over others. This is not right. The church should decide what it wants to do, not the government.

There is no good reason for an amendment to ban this. It will not help the economy. It might even help society in some way.

I have said all I need to say.

The war in Iraq was a serious problem. The American government did not tell the truth about why it started the war. They said it was because of the terrorist attacks on September 11th. However, that was not the real reason.

Many people do not like war. I am one of them. I think it is never a good idea to start a war just to be safe. In 2003, the United States invaded Iraq without a good reason.

This war was very similar to the Vietnam War. The US government wanted to remove the government of Iraq and make a new one. But they did not think about what would happen after the war. Many American soldiers died in the war. It was a sad and tragic thing.

The US government said it would be easy to make Iraq a democracy. But it was not that easy. It takes a long time to build a new government. The US government did not think about this before the war. They made it seem like it would be an easy job. But it was not.

The war in Iraq is difficult to end. If we start a war, we must think about what will happen after. We must be prepared for all possible outcomes. The US government was not prepared for the problems in Iraq.

Many American soldiers are still in Iraq and many are dying. The US government is trying to teach the Iraqi people how to govern themselves. But it is a long and hard process. I think the US government made a mistake by going to war. They did not tell the truth about their reasons. They made it seem like it would be an easy job. But it was not.

It is hard to decide what to do in a situation like this. If we go to war, we must finish what we start. But we must also think about the cost. Many American soldiers have died in the war. Is it worth it? I am not sure.

One of the reasons we went to war with Iraq was to get their oil. Oil is a very important resource. I think the US government was not honest about its reasons for the war. They said it was to make Iraq a democracy, but that was not true.

I hope the war in Iraq will end soon and there will be peace. But I do not think it will be easy.

I am for gay marriage.  I have always been.  I believe it is a personal preference and not something that people should be judged for.  Many studies have shown that being gay is not chosen, but rather something that people are born with.

I do not think that government should decide who can and cannot get married.  Marriage is a personal choice between two people, not something that should be controlled by the state.  In my neighborhood, there are openly gay couples who live normal lives and contribute to our community just like anyone else.

President Bush's decision to limit gay marriage is wrong.  Marriage is not something that he or anyone else should be able to decide.  I believe it is ridiculous for him to try to control what is a personal choice.

Many studies have shown that being gay is not a choice, but rather something that people are born with.  It is not something that people can change, and it is not something that they should be ashamed of.  I believe that people should be free to make their own choices about who they love and who they want to marry.

Marriage is a personal choice between two people, and it should not be controlled by the government.  If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it privately without anyone knowing.  But if two men or two women want to get married, it is a different story.

I believe that gay marriage should be a personal choice and not something that is decided by the government.  It is a private matter that should not be made public.

You cannot put something on the internet that is not true. The internet is a public place. Anything you put there is seen by many people. When you are friends with someone on Myspace or Facebook, you can see their messages. But this does not mean that the school can look at your private messages. The school can only act on something if someone tells them about it. They cannot ignore it or do nothing.

It can be hard to know what to believe. Some people only joke around on the internet. It could be like a school project that went wrong. Or it could be something very serious.

Something like this happened at our school. Someone overheard a student saying something and told the school. We found out it was not true, but it was on the student's Facebook page. The school got worried because it looked like he meant it. When you put something on the internet, you have no control over who sees it. If you don't want people to know something, don't put it on the internet.

School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. They should not look at their pages or messages. If a student's friend tells the school something, it's not an invasion of privacy. The school has to act on it if there is danger. They should not listen to phone calls or texts without a good reason.

A teacher should not make a secret account on the internet to be friends with students. This is not right. It's not fair to the students. The teacher should not know things about them that they don't want to share.

I think the war has gone too long. 

The purpose of the war was good at first. We wanted to bring democracy to a country that did not have a fair government. But now, it seems like the main reason for the war is just to show that we are a powerful country.

I also think the original reasons for the war were not clear. We were influenced by past events, like problems between the United States and Iraq. If we were fighting for democracy, it would be a good reason. But if there were personal reasons involved, it would not be good.

I believe we made our point in the first few months. Starting the war was a strong statement. But the war has gone on for many years. This is too long.

If our purpose was to bring democracy to a country ruled by a bad leader, it would be a good reason for war. But I think our reason has changed over time. We are now fighting just to fight.

The war has gone on too long. The country we are fighting will have to take care of itself soon. We are spending a lot of money on the war. This money could be used to solve problems in our own country, like poverty and poor public services.

We should stop the war. We have our own problems to solve. We should use our money to make our country better, not to fight a war that we no longer believe in.

We are spending too much money on the war. War should not be in our long-term budget. We have many problems in our country that need our attention, like health care and education.

I think that's all I want to say.

I have a question about something. It is true that people can see information on the internet. This is because when you put something online, it can be seen by many people. If you have a profile on a website, you allow others to see it when you add them as friends. 

However, it is difficult to have someone watch all students in school to prevent bad things. This could be unfair to some students. It is also not right to look at everyone's profiles just to find something wrong with them.

People are worried about strangers seeing their personal information online. For example, someone on TV showed how easy it is to get information about someone on the internet. He found a girl's screen name and talked to her on instant messenger in just a minute. You can also put pictures, class schedules, and other information on the internet. It can be hard to decide how much to share because you want to keep in touch with your friends.

You can limit what you put online, but you never know who can see it. My friend's high school did not allow students to have Myspace accounts. This made me wonder if the school had the right to tell students what to do online.

I am a little confused. We have a lot to talk about, including the Iraq War. I do not want to be part of the group of people who always say they were against the war from the start. But, I was against it. However, it does not matter much now. Most people agree that the war was not a good idea. In fact, almost eighty percent of people around the world think this way. Even many U.S. soldiers serving in Iraq think the war was a bad idea and we should leave within a year.

The situation in Iraq was bad before we arrived. It was a disaster. Now, leaving is also a difficult problem. There is a big difference in culture between the United States and countries in the Middle East. This makes it hard for us to understand each other. We must respect how other people want to live their lives.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader, but we should have thought carefully before invading Iraq. We must weigh the good and bad results of our actions. The war has been a disaster, like quicksand that pulls us down.

I do not see a good reason for us to stay in Iraq. The U.S. government may think there are good reasons to stay, but I do not agree. I do not see a reason why we should not leave now. Many Iraqis think the same way. They say we should leave within a year. We are trying to help them, but they are telling us to leave.

If we ask the Iraqis if they want us to leave, and they say yes, we cannot blame them if things go badly. If we decide to help them later, we will at least be seen as trying to do the right thing. Maybe we will never be seen as good guys in the Middle East, but it will be better than where we are now.

I think there is still a problem called gender bias in the United States. It is not just about men and women. The kind of work you do also makes a difference. 

For women, it can be harder to succeed because of a thing called the glass ceiling. Even though there should be equality, it is hard for women to find jobs where they can be in charge. This is because of the way society has been for a long time. In the past, men have been in charge. 

In many workplaces, women may have the qualifications for a job, but they may not get it because of their gender. It is the same for men in some industries, like fashion. 

Sometimes, people do not take men seriously if they are into fashion. They may think that men who like fashion are not normal. 

The same thing happens with men who stay at home to raise their children. Society does not expect men to do this, and it can be hard for them. 

But things are changing. More and more women are getting important jobs, and people are starting to accept this. Men who stay at home are also becoming more accepted. 

We need to promote people who are different and show their good qualities. If we do this in a gentle way, people will accept it. We have made a lot of progress, and change takes time. 

We also have a problem with people from different places being judged. If someone from a farm has poor grammar but is very smart, they may have trouble getting ahead because of where they come from. 

This is another example of discrimination. It can be between men and women, or it can be between people from different places. 

I do not know what the solution is, but we need to keep working on it.

I think they made marijuana a less serious crime. They changed it from a crime that gets you arrested to a ticket you get for something like a traffic ticket. This means that you don't have to be arrested and taken to jail. But, even if it's no longer a serious crime, some people worry about the future problems it can cause. These problems can affect things like job interviews and other important situations.

Some people think it costs a lot to arrest people, take them to court, and pay for their lawyers. This is true, especially for small cities that don't have much money. That's why some cities don't want to make marijuana a less serious crime, even if it would save them money.

But in some cities, like Denver, people are more open-minded. They think it's okay to make marijuana less serious. This means the city can use the money it saves to help people, like children, the elderly, and those who are homeless.

I think it's a good idea to make marijuana less serious. It's not something that should be everywhere, and there are good reasons for that. Also, making it less serious can save money for cities.

One problem with making it totally legal is that people might smoke it and drive cars. This is not safe. Also, in some places, smoking marijuana is still not accepted. If it's out in the open, it might be uncomfortable for some people.

Alcohol can be more dangerous than marijuana because it affects your driving skills. But marijuana can still have bad effects on people's lifestyles. How people react to substances is different. Some people are careful and don't have problems, while others do.

It's hard to say how marijuana affects people because everyone reacts differently. But I do think both marijuana and alcohol have their own problems.

I agree. Here's why:

The Catholic Church has many old customs that have been done for a long time. Some are good, but it is also important to change when necessary. Many Catholics go to church every week. They are very strict about how things are done. Sometimes, I feel like the Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules perfectly. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people from other religions. For example, my parents' religions were different. They could not get married in the Catholic Church because my father was not Catholic.

I do not think this is fair. We are taught to love others, which is a basic Catholic rule. It is hypocritical to say to love others and then not accept them. I think the Catholic Church's teachings and its practices do not match.

I do not think my own opinion on this would influence me. I think it would be good if priests could get married, but it would not stop them from behaving badly. Some people would harm children, even if they were married. This is because they are harming children, not because they are single or married.

The Church should be fair and accept people from all religions. They should also be careful with the people they choose to be priests. This is because priests have a lot of power and influence.

This is a very difficult subject. I am not sure what to think. Two things are very important here: government and church rules. One is about marriage and how it is defined. It is hard to decide on this issue without hurting anyone's feelings.

Marriage is a very special thing. It is between two people. But it is also a union of two people. It is like a partnership. The government should not decide what kind of marriage it is. This is because the government and church are separate.

If two people get married, they should be treated the same. They should not be looked at differently because of their marriage. They should get the same rights and taxes.

The question of gay marriage is also important. Two people love each other, and they want to be together. They should be able to get married and be treated the same as other couples.

If many states agree on this issue, it should be made into a federal law. But changing the constitution to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. The constitution should not be changed for a small issue like this.

It is not important enough to change the constitution. We should not make a big deal out of it.

I was raised in a Christian home. For me, homosexuality is a complicated issue. I have many gay friends, and this makes me think carefully about the subject. I do not agree with the idea, but I believe it should be legal. I do not think it's a national issue. Instead, I think each state should make its own decision.

If a state is democratic, it will probably support gay marriage. If you live in that state, you will know how it feels about this issue. I don't think you should disagree with the state's decision. You chose to live there, so you should respect its choice.

I believe homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. I think each state should decide whether to legalize gay marriage.

I already answered this question. This is my opinion.

I don't think President Bush should decide for the whole country what to do about gay marriage. I believe each state should decide for itself. I disagree with his decision to ban gay marriage.

I just think that the president should not make decisions for every state. He does not live in every state, so he cannot know what is best for each one. Some things should be left up to each individual state.

The president will not be in office for much longer. If a new president decides to change the ban on gay marriage, it will just go back and forth. I think each state should make its own decision. They will have to live with the choice, not the president.

No, I do not have the answer to that question.

I do not think school officials are wrong to look at student posts on Myspace. When you put something on the internet, it is like posting it in a public place. Everyone can see it, including school officials. They can find it even if it is not under the school's name.

If school officials look at Myspace to prevent a school shooting, I think it is okay. Keeping students safe is the school's job. They should do what they can to make the school a safe place.

Some school officials look at Myspace to see if students are doing things they should not be doing. They go on the internet to catch students who are breaking the rules. I think this is not right. It is an invasion of privacy. But if it helps make the school safer, I think it is okay.

It is easy to express yourself more when you are writing than when you are talking. When you post something on Myspace, you should think about what could happen. Once something is on the internet, it is always there. It can hurt you in the future.

If you do something bad when you are a student, it can come back and hurt you when you are older and important. You should think about this before you post something on the internet.

I do not think school officials should go on Myspace just to catch students. But if they have a good reason to look, like to make the school safer, it is okay. Parents trust the school to be a safe place for their children. I think school officials are just trying to do their job.

When I went to school, we had drills to prepare for a school shooting. We practiced what to do if someone came into the building. The school officials were trying to keep us safe. I think they are doing the same thing now by looking at Myspace.

They were trying to prevent something bad from happening, like a school shooting. They were just doing their job to keep the school a safe place.

I have mixed feelings about a war. I was affected by the September 11 attacks. I wanted to help. I thought we should go to another country and show them what we can do. But I now think we made a mistake.

We went to war without a good plan. We were angry and wanted revenge. I think we should have thought about the long-term effects. We didn't consider the people we were helping. They were busy fighting with each other.

I don't think it's our job to help them. If they can't work together, we can't make a difference. I don't care what happens there anymore. I think the people there are fighting for themselves, not for a better country.

War is different for them than it is for us. They are not interested in improving their country; they want us to leave. I think we should do that. We went to war on impulse, without thinking. We were looking for revenge, not a solution.

The president wanted to go to war because the people wanted it. But he should have had a better plan. He should have thought about what we would do there. We didn't have a clear goal. We didn't work together. We just went to war.

I don't think we can change them. They are the way they are. We can't stay there forever. We are hurting ourselves by staying. Once we leave, their country will fall apart. We should not be there.

I think we made a big mistake. We didn't think about what would happen. We were too angry. I don't think we should be in that country anymore.

The Catholic Church has some problems. They are losing followers. This is because the Church is not very accepting of many things. They have strong views on things like marriage between two men or women, abortion, and birth control. These views are old-fashioned in some ways. If the Church changed its views, they might not lose followers.

Many people are against the Church because of its views. They do not agree with the Church on some subjects. The Church says abortion is wrong, and if you think abortion is right, you may not want to be a part of the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you may not want to be in a Church that says it is wrong.

The Church does not allow priests to be married or have women as priests. But this may not have stopped the Church's problems. It is hard to say what would have happened if priests could be married or if there were women priests.

The Church says priests are married to God and are devoted to their work. But other people have jobs and families too. They can balance work and family life. Why can't priests?

I am not opposed to marriage between people of the same sex. 

I think people are born gay. They do not make this choice. 

Others and I do not think it is right to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot. 

People are born gay. They do not have a choice. This is not a decision they made. 

I do not think the federal government should decide who can get married. This is a personal issue. 

I do not think gay people should be punished. They should be free to be who they are. 

I believe the federal government should not be involved in this issue. It is not a matter of national security or morality. It is a personal issue. 

People should be free to live as they are. They should not be punished for being gay.

I believe that gay marriage should be legal. Here is why.

There is no good reason not to. Many people think that gay couples are a threat to the heterosexual family. But this is not true. Gay couples are not the same as heterosexual couples. They have their own unique things.

It's like two different sides of the same coin. One side is heads, and the other side is tails. They are not the same.

Gay couples have the same civil rights as everyone else. They should be able to own property and get health care just like anyone else. If a gay person is sick, their partner should be able to visit them in the hospital. This is not just about being family, it's about love.

Many studies show that gay couples are happy and successful just like any other couple. They have the same reasons for a happy relationship as everyone else.

The issue is not about getting married in a church. It's about getting a marriage certificate from the government. This is a legal document, not a church thing.

Separate but equal is not fair. If the government gives gay couples a civil union, they should be allowed to marry.

Some people are worried about adoption and community issues. But this is not a reason to deny gay couples the right to marry. They are the same as any other couple.

The main problem is how children are treated by other people in society. Gay couples should be treated the same as any other couple. They should be able to go to school and play with their friends like everyone else.

Gay couples can be good parents just like anyone else. They can be involved in their community and be good neighbors.

I think the federal government should be involved in making gay marriage legal. The government should not make laws based on one person's moral views. This is not fair to everyone else.

President Bush has strong views on this issue. He thinks about this because of his religion. But the government should not make laws based on one person's religion. This is not fair to everyone else.

Many people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are not normal. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says this is not true. We should listen to scientists and experts, not just what our friends and neighbors think.

If we listen to the experts, we will see that gay people are just like everyone else. They are normal people who deserve to be treated with respect.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. A drug is not good or bad just because the law says so. I don't think we should make it available to the public. But we can use it to help people if a doctor says it is okay.

Many medicines are not legal, but we use them because they are helpful. We use oxycodone, vicodin, and perocet to help patients. These are not available to just anyone. We use them because they are good for people. If we do not allow people to use marijuana because it is not legal, then that is not fair. Everyone should be able to use marijuana if it helps them.

Marijuana and alcohol are not the same. If you take too much marijuana, it can be bad for you. But if you drink too much alcohol, it can also be bad for you. We should not ban marijuana like we do with alcohol. We should make it legal, but people must use it responsibly.

People have a bad idea of marijuana because it is not allowed. But marijuana is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way we think about marijuana, people will use it responsibly. We can use it to help people who are sick.

The church has changed over time. It is not as strict as it was before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore nice dresses and matching shoes. I also had a matching purse. This was what I wore every time I went to church. I went to a private school and saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church together. Now, things are different. The church now has a shorter service. It lasts only thirty minutes. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. Some wear beach clothes. Families often come in late. The church is more casual now, even on Sundays. People wear jeans and khakis. This is a big change.

There are other things I notice about the church. This is the church I know. I do not understand the church's politics. I do not know why they make some decisions.

Some people say the Catholic Church could have prevented problems with priests by allowing women to be priests or by allowing priests to get married. I do not think this would have helped. Some men are married and still have problems with children. Their choice to be a priest is not the reason for their problems. 

In some religions, priests are allowed to get married. Some people become priests and still want to be married. If they want to practice their faith and be married, they can choose a different faith.

I think the reasons for some priests' problems are based on their genes. I do not think people become this way because of how they are raised. It is their genes. We cannot change that with marriage. It may come out later. The church cannot prevent this from happening. If they knew about the problem and covered it up, that is wrong. But I do not think they knew in all cases.

I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea, but the September 11th attacks changed everything. Many people were in shock and the US went to war in Iraq for different reasons. The Bush administration connected the war to Osama Bin Laden and said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. But this was not true.

The Bush administration lied to the American people and still has not admitted it. Colin Powell said he was not sure about the evidence when he presented it at the UN. This is wrong and against the law. It is an impeachable offense to lie to the people.

The Bush administration does not respect the US Constitution and has tried to limit its power since 9/11. They wanted to go to war from the start. A former treasury secretary said the younger Bush wanted to go to war with Iraq because of his father's feud with Saddam Hussein. He also wanted to get more oil.

I think the war has gone on too long. If the US withdraws now, there will be civil war and more deaths. But a new plan to have other countries like Syria and Saudi Arabia help Iraq is not good. It will create more problems because Iraq's independence will be at risk.

The new Iraqi government is not working well. The parliament is not effective and the Prime Minister does not have control. A radical leader's party has a lot of power and there are still many groups fighting for control. This is causing problems in the political process.

I did not know what to say. Let me think about it. 

The war in Iraq is a complicated problem. I do not know a lot about it. However, I think it started because of the terrorist attacks on the United States on September 11. We went to war in Iraq because we thought they were involved. 

Now, I am not sure why we are staying there. I think it is because we want to build a democratic government in Iraq. We also want to get oil from them. But this is not a good reason to stay. It makes many people unhappy. 

If we stay, we have to build a democracy. This will take time. It is not easy to build a new government. If we leave, people in Iraq will be unhappy with us. They will have to start again. 

I am confused about the war in Iraq. I do not know what to say. I think we should not call it a war anymore. It was not officially declared by Congress. I do not think it is a good reason to stay in Iraq.

I do think it is good to help the people in Iraq. But it is also wasting our resources. I feel sorry for President Bush. The war is making him look bad. It is like the Vietnam War, which was also not declared. That war is now known as a meaningless war.

It is hard to say what I think about the war in Iraq. There are many families with sons and daughters in the war. I want to help them, but I also think we are hurting the people in Iraq. We are making their lives harder. They have different customs and ways of life. If we stay, we will try to change them. This will make things worse for them.

I think the war in Iraq will go on for a long time. It is a complicated problem. I do not know what to say.

I do not think it is right for a state or government to make laws about what churches can or cannot do. The United States Constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control the church. 

The Constitution clearly says this. If the government tries to make laws about the church, it would go against what is already written. 

Some people are trying to make it illegal because most Catholics and Christians do not support it. But that is not right. The government should not decide what churches can or cannot do. It is up to the churches to decide.

The separation of church and state is very important in the United States. It allows people to be free to believe what they want. The government did plan to make an amendment to the Constitution, but that would be wrong. It would go against what is already written.

The government should not be involved in this issue. The president is pushing for this amendment because of his own personal beliefs as a Catholic. He is showing that he prefers one religion over others. This is not right. The church should decide what it wants to do, not the government.

There is no good reason for an amendment to ban this. It will not help the economy. It might even help society in some way.

I have said all I need to say.

The war in Iraq was a serious problem. The American government did not tell the truth about why it started the war. They said it was because of the terrorist attacks on September 11th. However, that was not the real reason.

Many people do not like war. I am one of them. I think it is never a good idea to start a war just to be safe. In 2003, the United States invaded Iraq without a good reason.

This war was very similar to the Vietnam War. The US government wanted to remove the government of Iraq and make a new one. But they did not think about what would happen after the war. Many American soldiers died in the war. It was a sad and tragic thing.

The US government said it would be easy to make Iraq a democracy. But it was not that easy. It takes a long time to build a new government. The US government did not think about this before the war. They made it seem like it would be an easy job. But it was not.

The war in Iraq is difficult to end. If we start a war, we must think about what will happen after. We must be prepared for all possible outcomes. The US government was not prepared for the problems in Iraq.

Many American soldiers are still in Iraq and many are dying. The US government is trying to teach the Iraqi people how to govern themselves. But it is a long and hard process. I think the US government made a mistake by going to war. They did not tell the truth about their reasons. They made it seem like it would be an easy job. But it was not.

It is hard to decide what to do in a situation like this. If we go to war, we must finish what we start. But we must also think about the cost. Many American soldiers have died in the war. Is it worth it? I am not sure.

One of the reasons we went to war with Iraq was to get their oil. Oil is a very important resource. I think the US government was not honest about its reasons for the war. They said it was to make Iraq a democracy, but that was not true.

I hope the war in Iraq will end soon and there will be peace. But I do not think it will be easy.

I am for gay marriage.  I have always been.  I believe it is a personal preference and not something that people should be judged for.  Many studies have shown that being gay is not chosen, but rather something that people are born with.

I do not think that government should decide who can and cannot get married.  Marriage is a personal choice between two people, not something that should be controlled by the state.  In my neighborhood, there are openly gay couples who live normal lives and contribute to our community just like anyone else.

President Bush's decision to limit gay marriage is wrong.  Marriage is not something that he or anyone else should be able to decide.  I believe it is ridiculous for him to try to control what is a personal choice.

Many studies have shown that being gay is not a choice, but rather something that people are born with.  It is not something that people can change, and it is not something that they should be ashamed of.  I believe that people should be free to make their own choices about who they love and who they want to marry.

Marriage is a personal choice between two people, and it should not be controlled by the government.  If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it privately without anyone knowing.  But if two men or two women want to get married, it is a different story.

I believe that gay marriage should be a personal choice and not something that is decided by the government.  It is a private matter that should not be made public.

You cannot put something on the internet that is not true. The internet is a public place. Anything you put there is seen by many people. When you are friends with someone on Myspace or Facebook, you can see their messages. But this does not mean that the school can look at your private messages. The school can only act on something if someone tells them about it. They cannot ignore it or do nothing.

It can be hard to know what to believe. Some people only joke around on the internet. It could be like a school project that went wrong. Or it could be something very serious.

Something like this happened at our school. Someone overheard a student saying something and told the school. We found out it was not true, but it was on the student's Facebook page. The school got worried because it looked like he meant it. When you put something on the internet, you have no control over who sees it. If you don't want people to know something, don't put it on the internet.

School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. They should not look at their pages or messages. If a student's friend tells the school something, it's not an invasion of privacy. The school has to act on it if there is danger. They should not listen to phone calls or texts without a good reason.

A teacher should not make a secret account on the internet to be friends with students. This is not right. It's not fair to the students. The teacher should not know things about them that they don't want to share.

I think the war has gone too long. 

The purpose of the war was good at first. We wanted to bring democracy to a country that did not have a fair government. But now, it seems like the main reason for the war is just to show that we are a powerful country.

I also think the original reasons for the war were not clear. We were influenced by past events, like problems between the United States and Iraq. If we were fighting for democracy, it would be a good reason. But if there were personal reasons involved, it would not be good.

I believe we made our point in the first few months. Starting the war was a strong statement. But the war has gone on for many years. This is too long.

If our purpose was to bring democracy to a country ruled by a bad leader, it would be a good reason for war. But I think our reason has changed over time. We are now fighting just to fight.

The war has gone on too long. The country we are fighting will have to take care of itself soon. We are spending a lot of money on the war. This money could be used to solve problems in our own country, like poverty and poor public services.

We should stop the war. We have our own problems to solve. We should use our money to make our country better, not to fight a war that we no longer believe in.

We are spending too much money on the war. War should not be in our long-term budget. We have many problems in our country that need our attention, like health care and education.

I think that's all I want to say.

I have a question about something. It is true that people can see information on the internet. This is because when you put something online, it can be seen by many people. If you have a profile on a website, you allow others to see it when you add them as friends. 

However, it is difficult to have someone watch all students in school to prevent bad things. This could be unfair to some students. It is also not right to look at everyone's profiles just to find something wrong with them.

People are worried about strangers seeing their personal information online. For example, someone on TV showed how easy it is to get information about someone on the internet. He found a girl's screen name and talked to her on instant messenger in just a minute. You can also put pictures, class schedules, and other information on the internet. It can be hard to decide how much to share because you want to keep in touch with your friends.

You can limit what you put online, but you never know who can see it. My friend's high school did not allow students to have Myspace accounts. This made me wonder if the school had the right to tell students what to do online.

I am a little confused. We have a lot to talk about, including the Iraq War. I do not want to be part of the group of people who always say they were against the war from the start. But, I was against it. However, it does not matter much now. Most people agree that the war was not a good idea. In fact, almost eighty percent of people around the world think this way. Even many U.S. soldiers serving in Iraq think the war was a bad idea and we should leave within a year.

The situation in Iraq was bad before we arrived. It was a disaster. Now, leaving is also a difficult problem. There is a big difference in culture between the United States and countries in the Middle East. This makes it hard for us to understand each other. We must respect how other people want to live their lives.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader, but we should have thought carefully before invading Iraq. We must weigh the good and bad results of our actions. The war has been a disaster, like quicksand that pulls us down.

I do not see a good reason for us to stay in Iraq. The U.S. government may think there are good reasons to stay, but I do not agree. I do not see a reason why we should not leave now. Many Iraqis think the same way. They say we should leave within a year. We are trying to help them, but they are telling us to leave.

If we ask the Iraqis if they want us to leave, and they say yes, we cannot blame them if things go badly. If we decide to help them later, we will at least be seen as trying to do the right thing. Maybe we will never be seen as good guys in the Middle East, but it will be better than where we are now.

I think there is still a problem called gender bias in the United States. It is not just about men and women. The kind of work you do also makes a difference. 

For women, it can be harder to succeed because of a thing called the glass ceiling. Even though there should be equality, it is hard for women to find jobs where they can be in charge. This is because of the way society has been for a long time. In the past, men have been in charge. 

In many workplaces, women may have the qualifications for a job, but they may not get it because of their gender. It is the same for men in some industries, like fashion. 

Sometimes, people do not take men seriously if they are into fashion. They may think that men who like fashion are not normal. 

The same thing happens with men who stay at home to raise their children. Society does not expect men to do this, and it can be hard for them. 

But things are changing. More and more women are getting important jobs, and people are starting to accept this. Men who stay at home are also becoming more accepted. 

We need to promote people who are different and show their good qualities. If we do this in a gentle way, people will accept it. We have made a lot of progress, and change takes time. 

We also have a problem with people from different places being judged. If someone from a farm has poor grammar but is very smart, they may have trouble getting ahead because of where they come from. 

This is another example of discrimination. It can be between men and women, or it can be between people from different places. 

I do not know what the solution is, but we need to keep working on it.

I think they made marijuana a less serious crime. They changed it from a crime that gets you arrested to a ticket you get for something like a traffic ticket. This means that you don't have to be arrested and taken to jail. But, even if it's no longer a serious crime, some people worry about the future problems it can cause. These problems can affect things like job interviews and other important situations.

Some people think it costs a lot to arrest people, take them to court, and pay for their lawyers. This is true, especially for small cities that don't have much money. That's why some cities don't want to make marijuana a less serious crime, even if it would save them money.

But in some cities, like Denver, people are more open-minded. They think it's okay to make marijuana less serious. This means the city can use the money it saves to help people, like children, the elderly, and those who are homeless.

I think it's a good idea to make marijuana less serious. It's not something that should be everywhere, and there are good reasons for that. Also, making it less serious can save money for cities.

One problem with making it totally legal is that people might smoke it and drive cars. This is not safe. Also, in some places, smoking marijuana is still not accepted. If it's out in the open, it might be uncomfortable for some people.

Alcohol can be more dangerous than marijuana because it affects your driving skills. But marijuana can still have bad effects on people's lifestyles. How people react to substances is different. Some people are careful and don't have problems, while others do.

It's hard to say how marijuana affects people because everyone reacts differently. But I do think both marijuana and alcohol have their own problems.

I agree. Here's why:

The Catholic Church has many old customs that have been done for a long time. Some are good, but it is also important to change when necessary. Many Catholics go to church every week. They are very strict about how things are done. Sometimes, I feel like the Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules perfectly. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people from other religions. For example, my parents' religions were different. They could not get married in the Catholic Church because my father was not Catholic.

I do not think this is fair. We are taught to love others, which is a basic Catholic rule. It is hypocritical to say to love others and then not accept them. I think the Catholic Church's teachings and its practices do not match.

I do not think my own opinion on this would influence me. I think it would be good if priests could get married, but it would not stop them from behaving badly. Some people would harm children, even if they were married. This is because they are harming children, not because they are single or married.

The Church should be fair and accept people from all religions. They should also be careful with the people they choose to be priests. This is because priests have a lot of power and influence.

This is a very difficult subject. I am not sure what to think. Two things are very important here: government and church rules. One is about marriage and how it is defined. It is hard to decide on this issue without hurting anyone's feelings.

Marriage is a very special thing. It is between two people. But it is also a union of two people. It is like a partnership. The government should not decide what kind of marriage it is. This is because the government and church are separate.

If two people get married, they should be treated the same. They should not be looked at differently because of their marriage. They should get the same rights and taxes.

The question of gay marriage is also important. Two people love each other, and they want to be together. They should be able to get married and be treated the same as other couples.

If many states agree on this issue, it should be made into a federal law. But changing the constitution to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. The constitution should not be changed for a small issue like this.

It is not important enough to change the constitution. We should not make a big deal out of it.

I was raised in a Christian home. For me, homosexuality is a complicated issue. I have many gay friends, and this makes me think carefully about the subject. I do not agree with the idea, but I believe it should be legal. I do not think it's a national issue. Instead, I think each state should make its own decision.

If a state is democratic, it will probably support gay marriage. If you live in that state, you will know how it feels about this issue. I don't think you should disagree with the state's decision. You chose to live there, so you should respect its choice.

I believe homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. I think each state should decide whether to legalize gay marriage.

I already answered this question. This is my opinion.

I don't think President Bush should decide for the whole country what to do about gay marriage. I believe each state should decide for itself. I disagree with his decision to ban gay marriage.

I just think that the president should not make decisions for every state. He does not live in every state, so he cannot know what is best for each one. Some things should be left up to each individual state.

The president will not be in office for much longer. If a new president decides to change the ban on gay marriage, it will just go back and forth. I think each state should make its own decision. They will have to live with the choice, not the president.

No, I do not have the answer to that question.

I do not think school officials are wrong to look at student posts on Myspace. When you put something on the internet, it is like posting it in a public place. Everyone can see it, including school officials. They can find it even if it is not under the school's name.

If school officials look at Myspace to prevent a school shooting, I think it is okay. Keeping students safe is the school's job. They should do what they can to make the school a safe place.

Some school officials look at Myspace to see if students are doing things they should not be doing. They go on the internet to catch students who are breaking the rules. I think this is not right. It is an invasion of privacy. But if it helps make the school safer, I think it is okay.

It is easy to express yourself more when you are writing than when you are talking. When you post something on Myspace, you should think about what could happen. Once something is on the internet, it is always there. It can hurt you in the future.

If you do something bad when you are a student, it can come back and hurt you when you are older and important. You should think about this before you post something on the internet.

I do not think school officials should go on Myspace just to catch students. But if they have a good reason to look, like to make the school safer, it is okay. Parents trust the school to be a safe place for their children. I think school officials are just trying to do their job.

When I went to school, we had drills to prepare for a school shooting. We practiced what to do if someone came into the building. The school officials were trying to keep us safe. I think they are doing the same thing now by looking at Myspace.

They were trying to prevent something bad from happening, like a school shooting. They were just doing their job to keep the school a safe place.

I have mixed feelings about a war. I was affected by the September 11 attacks. I wanted to help. I thought we should go to another country and show them what we can do. But I now think we made a mistake.

We went to war without a good plan. We were angry and wanted revenge. I think we should have thought about the long-term effects. We didn't consider the people we were helping. They were busy fighting with each other.

I don't think it's our job to help them. If they can't work together, we can't make a difference. I don't care what happens there anymore. I think the people there are fighting for themselves, not for a better country.

War is different for them than it is for us. They are not interested in improving their country; they want us to leave. I think we should do that. We went to war on impulse, without thinking. We were looking for revenge, not a solution.

The president wanted to go to war because the people wanted it. But he should have had a better plan. He should have thought about what we would do there. We didn't have a clear goal. We didn't work together. We just went to war.

I don't think we can change them. They are the way they are. We can't stay there forever. We are hurting ourselves by staying. Once we leave, their country will fall apart. We should not be there.

I think we made a big mistake. We didn't think about what would happen. We were too angry. I don't think we should be in that country anymore.
